title: Tim Farron
summary: Timothy James Farron (born 27 May 1970) is a British politician who served as Leader of the Liberal Democrats from 2015 to 2017. He has also served as Member of Parliament (MP) for Westmorland and Lonsdale since 2005, prior to entering parliament Farron worked in Higher Education.[1]  He serves as the Liberal Democrat Spokesperson for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs, Spokesperson for Housing, Planning, the Northern Powerhouse and Local Growth, and Ministry of Housing, Communities and Local Government.
